about.story: eSync was born from a simple observation: Zambian schools struggled with fragmented systems that didn't work together. Teachers used one tool for attendance, another for grades, finance teams used spreadsheets, and parents were left in the dark. We knew there had to be a better way. Built by education-focused technologists who understand the African school environment, eSync combines powerful features with the reliability and simplicity that Zambian schools need. Today, we're proud to partner with schools across the region to transform education through technology.

faq.question: What happens if the internet goes down?
faq.answer: eSync is optimised for low-bandwidth environments. The system works efficiently even on slow connections (2G/3G).

faq.question: Is my school's data secure?
faq.answer: Yes. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption. We maintain automatic daily backups, conduct regular security audits, implement strict role-based access control, and comply with international data protection standards.

faq.question: Can we import existing student data?
faq.answer: Yes. We support Excel and CSV imports for students, staff, classes, and subjects. Our onboarding team will assist with data mapping, validation, and clean migration to ensure accuracy. The import process is typically completed within 24-48 hours.

faq.question: What are the minimum technical requirements?
faq.answer: eSync works on any device with a modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). Minimum internet: 1 Mbps for basic operations. Mobile access requires Android 6+ or iOS 12+. No software installation required—everything is browser-based and cloud-hosted.

faq.question: How long does implementation take?
faq.answer: Typical implementation takes 1-2 weeks: Day 1 for registration and initial setup, Days 2-4 for data import and configuration, Days 5-10 for staff training and testing. Your dedicated onboarding specialist guides every step.

faq.question: Can we customise eSync for our school?
faq.answer: Absolutely. eSync supports workflow customisation, custom reporting, API integrations, and branded mobile apps. Custom development is quoted separately based on scope. Most schools find our standard features meet 95%+ of their needs.

faq.question: What if we have more than 1000 students?
faq.answer: eSync handles schools of any size with no student limits. Performance remains fast and reliable whether you have 50 or 5000 students. Pricing is the same regardless of school size—one fair plan for all Zambian schools.

faq.question: How do parents get access to their child's information?
faq.answer: Parents get a web portal. Teachers/admins can share announcements, attendance updates, grades, and fee balances in real-time. Parents receive SMS and in-app notifications about important updates and can communicate directly with teachers through the platform.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept Zambian bank transfers, mobile money (MTN Money, Airtel Money). You can pay monthly, per term, per semester, or annually. Quarterly billing is also available for larger schools.

faq.question: Is there a free trial or demo?
faq.answer: No but we offer 25% off your first 3 months when you sign up within the next 30 days. We also provide a live demo of the platform so you can see all features in action and ask any questions before committing.
